Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs, enhancing your daily life or work in numerous ways. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at an exclusive price of $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to make the most out of its features. Don't miss this chance to elevate your experience! Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
